bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Mary Oneil. Criminal

keywords.term: Robinson T. J. Lamar J. D

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla

In Justice Court before J. D. Lamar Justice of the Peace
Territory of Washington -Vs- Charge of Vagrancy Mary Oneal P} being a habitual drunkard

T. J. Robinson Marshall of Walla Walla City arresting and persecuting witness Defendant arrested March 7 1886 as it says in complaint filed March 8 1886 and warrant issued. to T. J. Robinson Marshall who return the same into this March 8th 1886 with the defendant under arrest defendant adm itted to charge and plead guilty. T. J. Robin son when the court being satisfied in the matter it is here now of and adj udged by the court that the defendant be required to give bail in the sum of fifty dollars for her good behavior for the term of three months and that in default thereof that she be committed to the County Jail for the term of three months or until she shall be discharged by due process of law.
